title: Adventures of Captain Africa: mighty jungle avenger. Vol. 2
creator_credit: Spencer Bennet, Sam Katzman and Columbia Pictures
brief_description: Captain Africa helps the Arabian caliph Hamid to regain his throne which has been stolen from him by a rival. Aided by adventurer Ted Arnold, hunter Nat Coleman, his assistant Omar and Arabian princess Rhoda, Captain Africa battles wild animals, the usurper’s army and a pair of white adventurers. For some reason this movie serial was banned in Finland. Cast includes John Hart, Rick Vallin, Ben Welden, June Howard, Bud Osborne, Paul Marion, Lee Roberts.
